flavor.reason: Some diners enjoyed the hot pot and sauces, but others criticized the lack of seasoning in BBQ meats and bland broths.

freshness.reason: Mixed reviews on ingredient quality, with some praising freshness and others noting stale items.

service.reason: Inconsistent service experiences, with reports of both friendly staff and unprofessional behavior.

environment.reason: Modern and clean ambiance, but issues with ventilation and occasional cleanliness concerns.

value.reason: Reasonable pricing for all-you-can-eat, but inconsistent food and service affect perceived value.
